div.div: Welcome to Valley Center Public Schools

span.style: font-size: 16px;;color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

strong.span:
Beginning Monday, April 6,
and continuing throughout
the school closure, the
District Office has modified
its hours. The official hours
are from 9:00-3:00, Monday
through Friday. Staff are
available by phone/email
during those times. Please
do not hesitate to contact us.

p.span:
Valley Center USD 262 serves around 3,000 students from the communities of Valley Center, Park City, Kechi, and Wichita. Our location provides a unique opportunity to blend the benefits of a small town with easy access to everything Metro-Wichita has to offer.
Our school configuration includes one Pre-K-3 building; two K-3 schools; an intermediate school which houses the fourth and fifth grades; a sixth, seventh and eighth grade middle school; and a 5A high school. We also offer virtual and adult learning opportunities at The Learning Center, which assists students of all ages earn their high school diploma.
The district’s 400+ employees strive to make the vision, “To Be a Premier School District Known for Excellence in Education, Innovative Instruction, Outstanding Programs, and Dedication to Students” a reality through continual staff development, district-wide strategic planning, and by all focusing on what is best for our students.
We are extremely proud of our school community and invite you to partner with us to help all our students enjoy success.

div.div: 143 S Meridian, Valley Center, KS 67147 | Phone 316-755-7000 | Fax 316-755-7001
